# 2000 Colonial Classic â€“ Draw

Andre Agassi
| runner =  Mark Philippoussis
| score = walkover
| type = no
}}
Thomas Enqvist was the defending champion, but lost in the semifinals to Andre Agassi.
Andre Agassi won the final after receiving a walkover from Mark Philippoussis due to neck strain.
Players
Andre Agassi (champion, first place)
#  Yevgeny Kafelnikov (first round, eighth place)
#  Pete Sampras (semifinals, third place)
#  Thomas Enqvist (semifinals, withdrew due to a shoulder injury, fourth place)
#  Nicolas Kiefer (first round, sixth place)
#  Richard Krajicek (first round, fifth place)
#  Mark Philippoussis (final, withdrew due to neck strain, second place)
#  Wayne Ferreira (first round, seventh place)
}}
